original_title: The Life, Legend and Legacy of Donald P. Borchers
overview: A documentary looking at the life and times of Donald P. Borchers, one of Hollywood's most underrated and under-acknowledged independent film producers. Particularly associated with New World Pictures in the 1980s, Borchers made a considerable mark in Hollywood, including through launching such franchises as "Angel" and "Children of the Corn."
title: The Life, Legend and Legacy of Donald P. Borchers
